name: Cacildes Adventure
description:
A coming of age Action RPG about a boy on his journey to join the king's army.

THE STARTING POINT
You are Cacildes, a young boy eagerly awaiting a letter from the King, which will determine your future in the Royal Army.

In the meantime, your mother is worried: many chickens have gone missing. Driven by the threat of no more breakfast pancakes and other egg delicacies, you set out to find what is going on.



KEY FEATURES

  • Emphasis on combat, drawing inspiration from the soulslike genre, with parrying, jump-attacks, guard-breaking, weapon scaling, bonfires and a soul system that allows you to recover lost experience upon death
  • A dynamic day and night system, with events unfolding at different hours of the day. Harder enemies may appear at night, while others may sleep, allowing you to sneak past them
  • Factions and reputation system influenced by your actions and clothing choices.You may go unnoticed by factions if wearing same armor; If you have a negative reputation, people may close their doors when you're around
  • Fight alongside companions to divide and conquer challenges! But beware, enemies will have more health the more companions you have in your party
  • Craft your own potions, with ingredients that will replenish after a couple of days; find ores to upgrade your weapons at a blacksmith
  • And much, much more, with secret bosses, gear and acessories that influence gameplay, and hidden areas to explore



FRIENDS ALONG THE WAY
